attributes.action: Investigate BBC bias during the EU referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Ukip were treated like second class citizens and were continually accused of unsubstantiated racism. The BBC are funded by the public and should therefore be totally unbiased. Quite the contrary exists. The BBC follow there own left wing agenda and it is about time this was bias was erradicated.
attributes.background: The BBC were quite clearly biased towards staying in the EU during the referendum debate. Remain campaigners were given a free rein during debates whilst Out campaigners were interupted continually by the host(s) during the same debates.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The BBC Trust is responsible for investigating breaches of the BBC Charter, which includes complaints about the impartiality of the BBC.

You can get in touch with the BBC Trust using the following website:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/bbctrust/contact_us
